extendedInfo.description: 'Guess The Actor' is the perfect game for try your knowledge about movies. Thousands of actors to guess in this endless addictive game.This game uses the fantastic online database from themoviedb.org, this means, thousands and thousands of actors to guess...The best movie quiz/trivia in the market.You can download images clicking on them!!! (sdcard/download)New versions with a lot of new options come very soon!
